name: Icy Quill
description:
Your character deals 1 increased Cryo DMG (Includes the DMG triggered by Cryo-infused Swirl reactions)
Usage(s): 2
Your character will not consume any Usages when triggering this effect through Normal Attacks. (Once per round)

(Once per round)
